REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0765 reute d f BC-TITAN-<TTN>-EXTENDS-O 03-12 0052

TEXT.TITLE: TITAN <TTN> EXTENDS ODD LOT TENDER OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Titan Corp said it extended its odd-lot tender offer program to purchase shares of its preferred stock to June 10, 1987. The offer is made to holders of 99 or fewer preferred shares. The offer was originally scheduled to expire March 10. Reuter
